trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKZE016_04255_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Something goes bump in Greatest Endsvale, and it has Mopingway concerned.
TEXT_AKTKZE016_04255_MOPINGWAY_000_000<tab>Oh dear... Oh my, oh dear, this is terrible!
TEXT_AKTKZE016_04255_MOPINGWAY_000_001<tab>Thank goodness you're here! There's a strange sound coming from the waterway. I think there might be something wrong with the water regulation system.

TEXT_AKTKZE016_04255_MOPINGWAY_000_002<tab>What if the water starts to flow backwards? Or worse! Everything must be inspected from top to bottom, but time is of the essence, and I can't possibly hope to do it all on my own... Not as quickly as I'd like, at any rate. Please say you will help.
TEXT_AKTKZE016_04255_MOPINGWAY_000_003<tab>Oh, thank goodness. Look for the water towers to the north and you'll find the regulators.
TEXT_AKTKZE016_04255_MOPINGWAY_000_004<tab>If you can take care of that, I will see to the rest. We can reconvene here when you've finished.
TEXT_AKTKZE016_04255_MOPINGWAY_000_005<tab>Inspect the water towers to the north and I will see to the rest.
TEXT_AKTKZE016_04255_SYSTEM_000_010<tab>You hear nothing out of the ordinary.
TEXT_AKTKZE016_04255_SYSTEM_000_011<tab>You hear an odd bubbling murmur. This machine seems to be malfunctioning.
TEXT_AKTKZE016_04255_MOPINGWAY_000_020<tab>How did everything look on your side?
TEXT_AKTKZE016_04255_MOPINGWAY_000_021<tab>A murmur by the northeast regulator? Hmmm... I think I know what the problem is.
TEXT_AKTKZE016_04255_MOPINGWAY_000_022<tab>We released fish into the river so that our guests could go fishing, but they're likely attracted to the heat of the regulators.

TEXT_AKTKZE016_04255_MOPINGWAY_000_023<tab>Not to worry! This is but one little bump on the road to building a fantastic recreational facility, and thanks to you, the path forward can be made smoother.
TEXT_AKTKZE016_04255_MOPINGWAY_000_024<tab>When our work is finished, I hope you'll visit again and make the most of what we have to offer.
